dmca.title: Warez Illegal On Your Servers ???
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: Darklitght2005@aol.com [mailto:Darklitght2005@aol.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2005 11:15 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com; support@theplanet.com;
webmaster@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; admin@theplanet.com
Subject: Warez Illegal On Your Servers ???

 Hello,
The below host and the below Warez site is on your servers. I would suggest 
you rip them down ASAP. Last time I emailed you about a Warez site it took 3

weeks to get a response so I am going to say this to begin with.

 Rip the following sites down or your Data Center will be informed. Sorry
for 
being rude but I dont like to be ignored when someone is stealing my
software 
and apps my comapny makes and gives it away for free.

 Your Reseller that allows Warez:
http://thevida.com

 The Warez illegal site:
http://www.warezdll.net

 Again I want it down asap I will not tolerate this site being online and 
giving away my stuff for free.

 Ron Howard
 CEO NetTronicx Inc
